entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
